entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Wartime leader trump has his forces shooting into the night at the enemy he can’t see and can’t hit. trump’s surrounded by COVID19, testing would make the enemy visible but trump suppressed testing so COVID19 remains hidden striking when it wants.
